attributes.review:
OMG i was waking down the street when i decided to download this app because i am a racist person who supports an orange. the second that i downloaded it THE APP SHOWED ME A DISGUSTING IMAGE!!

edit: wait nevermind that was trump‚Äôs face üòÉ
 
continued: once i got over the trauma i experienced when i saw that face, i noticed that my phone smelled so bad !! it was probably donald trump‚Äôs smell that was so stinky it reached me all the way from his bunker where he‚Äôs hiding!! but the horrible part was that the smell attracted pigs !! as the pigs attacked me i ran away but they caught up to me !! they were so racist and it scared me !! 

edit: the pigs turned out to be cops nevermind üòÉ

anyways, i continued to run but they kept attacking me but once i finally got away i ran back home. BUT THEY FOLLOWED ME üëÅüëÑüëÅ i went to sleep but i woke up at 13:12 because MY HOUSE WAS UNDER ATTACK !! they shot at me but unlike breonna taylor (may she rest in peace‚ù§Ô∏è justice for breonna taylor ‚ÄºÔ∏è) i survived. in the end i survived all of the horrible things that this app threw at me and i definitely do not recommend downloading it !! some alternative things to do other than use this app are: 

1. sign petitions to get justice for breonna taylor
2. sign petitions to get justice for elijah mcclain
3. go to blm protests
4. educate yourself on the oppression people of color pace every day
5. educate others about the blm movement 
6. understand what trump actually stands for 
and finally: settle for biden 2020
